dct_title_s: Seat of war in the east : map of Turkey and parts adjacent / compiled and published by authority of the Hon. the Sec. of War ; in the Office of the Chief of Engineers under the direction of Brig. Gen. A. A. Humpreys, Chief of Engineers and Bvt. Maj. Genl., United States Army ; compiled and drawn by Denis Callahan.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Latitudes east of Greenwich shown. Latitudes east of Paris indicated in margin. Map was issued during the Russo -Turkey War of 1877-1878. Map shows international borders, railroads in operation and projected, turnpikes, country roads, and maritime distance between major ports. With a bilingual glossary of terms used in the map. "The Principality of Roumania consists of Moldavia and Walachia." Includes ancillary map of southern Europe, Asia Minor, and northern Africa.
dct_creator_sm: United States. Army. Office of the Chief of Engineers
dct_publisher_sm: [Washington, D.C.] : Office of the Chief of Engineers, 1877.
